page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: INTRODUCTION { {THIS AREA CONTAINS TWO VILLAGES {SURROUNDED BY A LANDSCAPE WHICH IS {DOMINATED BY FARMLAND.THIS FARMLAND IS {INTERSPERSED WITH SMALL AREAS OF {WOODLAND:ANCIENT DECIDUOUS FOREST {AND NEWER CONIFEROUS PLANTATIONS.A {LARGE PROPORTION OF THE AREA IS PART {OF THE FITZWILLIAM ESTATE WHICH {EMPLOYS A SIGNIFICANT NUMBER OF THE {INHABITANTS.THERE IS A SPARSE {POPULATION CONCENTRATED IN THE TWO {VILLAGES.THE OPEN UNDULATING {COUNTRYSIDE SLOPES GENTLY DOWN TO THE {RIVER NENE WITH LARGE ELECTRICITY {PYLONS DOMINATING THE SKYLINE. { { }
